about_the_game:
A pirate-themed costume set for Velvet, Magilou, Eleanor, Rokurou, Laphicet, and Eizen.

Includes:
  • Pirate Velvet
  • Pirate Rokurou
  • Pirate Laphicet
  • Pirate Eizen
  • Pirate Magilou
  • Pirate Eleanor
detailed_description:
A pirate-themed costume set for Velvet, Magilou, Eleanor, Rokurou, Laphicet, and Eizen.

Includes:

  • Pirate Rokurou
  • Pirate Laphicet
  • Pirate Eizen

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8400 3.0GHz or AMD Phenom II X2 550, 3.1GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 9800 GTX or AMD Radeon HD 4850
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7, 8, 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-750, 2.66GHz or AMD Phenom II X4 965, 3.2GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 560 or Radeon HD 7870
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 11 compatible
